summary: The Veterans Health Administration provides health care to over 10 million veterans every year. In January 2020, the VHA began preparing for the COVID-19 pandemic. We spoke with officials at four VHA medical centers who reported taking similar steps to prepare. For example, all four VHA medical centers: Developed plans for screening and testing Trained staff on the use of personal protective equipment Identified the...
title: COVID-19: Implementation and Oversight of Preparedness Strategies at Veterans Affairs Medical Centers
